<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/50528</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_461</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_461</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Sucesiones de números reales</string>
            <string language="en">Sequences of real numbers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reihenfolgen der realen Zahlen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ordres de vrais nombres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Seqüências de números reais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sequenze dei numeri reali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακολουθίες πραγματικών αριθμών</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones una introducción al concepto de sucesión de números reales. Se estudian la definición, el término general y la representación gráfica de una sucesión de números reales.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations as an introduction to the concept of sequence of real numbers. It studies the definition, general term and graphical representation of the sequence of real numbers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">sucesión</string>
            <string language="en">sequence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">representación gráfica</string>
            <string language="en">graphical representation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">real</string>
            <string language="en">real</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">números</string>
            <string language="en">numbers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">término general</string>
            <string language="en">general term</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit, welches Simulationen 
als Einleitung zum Konzept der Reihenfolge der realen Zahlen 
verwendet. Es studiert die Definition, die allgemeine 
Bezeichnung und die graphische Darstellung der Reihenfolge der realen 
Zahlen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement ce qui utilise des 
simulations comme introduction au concept de l'ordre de vrais nombres.
Il étudie la définition, la limite générale et la 
représentation graphique de l'ordre de vrais nombres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando qual usa simulações como uma 
introdução ao conceito da seqüência de números reais. 
Estuda a definição, o termo geral e a respresentação 
gráfica da seqüência de números reais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quale usa le simulazioni come
introduzione al concetto della sequenza dei numeri reali. Studia
la definizione, il termine generale e la rappresentazione grafica 
della sequenza dei numeri reali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
ως εισαγωγή στην έννοια της ακολουθίας πραγματικών αριθμών. 
Μελετά τον καθορισμό, το γενικό όρο και τη γραφική 
αντιπροσώπευση της ακολουθίας πραγματικών αριθμών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reihenfolge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">graphische Darstellung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">real</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zahlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">allgemeine Bezeichnung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ordre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">représentation graphique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vrai</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">nombres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">limite générale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">seqüência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">respresentação gráfica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">real</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rappresentazione grafica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">reale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">numeri</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">termine generale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
        </general>
